summary: Most requested changes for rebranding to an original battle game name (Skylance Royale), updating PWA metadata, implementing a single-player battle-style game loop, wiring generated assets via /assets/generated paths, and updating Play Store publishing docs appear to be implemented. One leftover reference to "Free Fire India" remains in project_state.json based on the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace any use of the name "Free Fire" / "Free Fire India" with an original game name and branding throughout the app (UI copy, metadata, docs).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows project_state.json still contains the phrase "Free Fire India" in its summary text, which violates the acceptance criterion that no document text contains "Free Fire"/"Free Fire India".

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained an empty placeholder hook file (useQueries.ts) unrelated to the requested battle game/PWA/Play Store changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for introducing placeholder query hooks; this appears to be extra scaffolding not tied to REQ-16â€“REQ-20.
